title: [roll] Awards
body:
**ROLLS CAN BE ANYWHERE IN GD, NOT JUST IN THIS THREAD!**

So this is basically a follow-up to [GotRektGG's thread here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/8zm2N3ag).

There will be a unique badge/title to the first people that roll:

http://i.imgur.com/qeeryi8.png

Winner: Cancerous Lulu
**1,000:** Lady Luck http://i.imgur.com/A6fpR7h.png[/img]
---
**RULES**

1. Badges/Titles will last until the end of November.

2. If somebody manages to win more than once, they can only have one badge/title and must pick.

3. Rolls for the awards are valid anywhere on Riot's Boards, not just this thread.
---
There's no guarantee this will happen once the awards are given out, since I thought it could be a fun little thing to do in light of a new feature.
